itemdesc-wayfindercompass: A mystical compass that can guide you to a friend. Right-click to select a player and teleport to them (with their consent). Consumed on use.
itemdesc-heroscallstone: A glowing stone imbued with summoning magic. Right-click to select a player and summon them to your location (with their consent). Consumed on use.
itemdesc-beaconband: A silver band that links you with allies. Right-click to set a beacon code. Players with matching codes can see each other's direction and distance on a compass HUD. Works while worn as a bracer or kept in your inventory.
